questions.question: How many days did the Jukto Front government remain in power?
What was the primary reason given by the Pakistan government for dismissing the Jukto Front government?
options: A riot between Bengalis and non-Bengalis
questions.answer: A riot between Bengalis and non-Bengalis

questions.question: Which party's leader, A.K. Fazlul Huq, became the Chief Minister after the Jukto Front's victory?
What was one of the 21-point demands of the Jukto Front?
In 1966, what percentage of positions in the Pakistan president's secretariat were held by Bengalis?
According to the text, what form of government was proposed in the 6-point demands?
options: Parliamentary form under a federal system
questions.answer: Parliamentary form under a federal system

questions.question: Who is credited as the proponent of the historic 6-point program?
What event led to President Iskander Mirza declaring martial law in 1958?
options: A brawl in the provincial assembly
The assassination of a political leader
questions.answer: A brawl in the provincial assembly

questions.question: In the 1970 general election, how many seats did the Awami League win in the central parliament?
What date is observed as Martyr's Day in Bangladesh?
